Imagine if we inserted it into other species.

"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5542630f6368727cdc7c2d00#post_5542630f6368727cdc7c2d00
Reminds me of what I was doing last night.
Now I have nothing else to do but show up to my last two classes of the semester, and take my one and only final exam.

And them I'm done for the year, and get to go home for the summer.
-Unless fate dicks with me and I have to retake a math class over the summer. Heck, ANY class.-

-But mostly math, because I f*cking hate math, and I want to be done with my math class, and then I'll never have to worry about math classes ever again, since my major isn't very math heavy at all.-
